description: Designed after ginkgo leaves, this rectifier generates smooth and stable waveforms, making it reliable for a wide range of combat situations.
ranks: Energy Regen is increased by 12.8%. When Basic Attack hits a target, Basic Attack Damage is increased by 3.2%. This effect can stack up to 5 times and last for 8s.
